revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Seafoam Islands |image = [[File:Seafoam Islands.png|thumb]] |caption = An overhead map of the Seafoam Islands. |tokens = 1,250 |location = East of Cinnabar Island, on route 19. }} The '''Seafoam Islands''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Kanto]]. It has 25 tiles arranged in a 5x5 square, including 5 chest tiles, 13 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 17,226 HP.
== Tables des rencontres == === Rencontres sauvages ===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Zubat || colspan=2 rowspan=9|

==Objets== ===Sans Perte de Bonus===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Weight !! 0 Clears !! 100 Clears !! 500 Clears |- | align="center" colspan=5| '''Common''' |- | {{Bag2|xAttack}} || 2 || 52.07% || 50.63% || 44.44% |- | {{Bag2|Aspear}} || N/A || 26.03% || 25.32% || 22.22% |- | align="center" colspan=5| '''Rare''' |- | {{Bag2|Blue Shard}} || N/A || 20.85% || 22.14% || 27.72% |- | align="center" colspan=5| '''Legendary''' |- | {{Bag2|Revive}} || N/A || 1.04% || 1.68% || 4.43% |- | align="center" colspan=5| '''Mythic''' |- | {{Bag2|Ultraball}} || N/A || 0.01% || 0.23% || 1.18% |}
===Table du taux d'obtention avec Perte de bonus===
After Reaching Sinnoh, the drop chance for items in Kanto will be debuffed for any loot with a Tier rarer than Rare (ie: Epic, Legendary, Mythic).
{| class="wikitable collapsible collapsed" |- ! Chest Item !! Weight !! 0 Clears !! 100 Clears !! 500 Clears |- | align="center" colspan=5| '''Common''' |- | {{Bag2|xAttack}} || 2 || 50.45% || 50.45% || 50.45% |- | {{Bag2|Aspear}} || N/A || 25.23% || 25.23% || 25.23% |- | align="center" colspan=5| '''Rare''' |- | {{Bag2|Blue Shard}} || N/A || 24.22% || 24.22% || 24.22% |- | align="center" colspan=5| '''Legendary''' |- | {{Bag2|Revive}} || N/A || 0.10% || 0.10% || 0.10% |- | align="center" colspan=5| '''Mythic''' |- | {{Bag2|Ultraball}} || N/A || <0.01% || <0.01% || <0.01% |}
